title: Lynda Wordpress DIY FreelanceIndependent Website Tutorial
description:
Lynda Wordpress DIY FreelanceIndependent Website Tutorial


Build a website for your independent business in the
same spirit you run it. DIY (do it yourself) with
WordPress. In this course, Morten Rand-Hendriksen shows how
to create a website complete with a contact form, social
sharing buttons, front page slider, and a photo gallery. He
walks through every step in the process: from site planning
and finding the right plugins, to installing a new theme
and customizing the appearance of your site to match your
brand. Plus, get tips for prepping and sharing your site
with the world

Find more courses in this series in our WordPress DIY
playlist

Topics include:

* Establishing the goals for the site

* Making a content inventory

* Adding custom menus

* Installing and activating themes

* Customizing the front page

* Setting up a contact form and social media buttons

* Controlling SEO and social sharing text
* Securing your site and managing spam
